pages.text: Using a $(item)Bottle/$ at cloud level (Between Y level 192 and 196) will get you a $(item)Cloud in a Bottle/$, which can be used to place temporary blocks in the air. They are non-solid and will disappear after a few seconds, but placing a block on it will instead replace the cloud. The $(thing)Cloud/$ will return to the $(item)Bottle/$ when you do this.
